name: Kafka-notes
body:
## Start

zookeeper : *bin*/**zookeeper-server-start.sh** *config*/**zookeeper.properties**
kafka : *bin*/**kafka-server-start.sh** *config*/**server.properties**

## topics

*bin*/**kafka-topics.sh**

create : **--create** *--zookeeper zookeeperAddress:port --replication-factor [1-X] --partitions 1 --topic name*
list : **--list** --zookeeper zookeeperAddress:port

## Console tests

Producer : *bin*/**kafka-console-producer.sh** *--broker-list address:port --topic name*
Consumer : *bin*/**kafka-console-consumer.sh** *--zookeeper address:port --topic name --from-beginning*
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
